text: Udo Jürgens (born Udo Jürgen Bockelmann, 30 September 1934 – 21 December 2014) was an Austrian composer and singer of popular music whose career spans over fifty years. He wrote more than 800 songs and sold over 100 million records. In 2007 he additionally obtained Swiss citizenship.Udo Jürgens ist jetzt Schweizer , article published on 28 February 2007 at blick.ch (in German) He was known for his song "Reach for the Stars". and titular song called Vielen Dank für die Blumen the German language dub animated short series Tom and Jerry. Jürgens died on 21 December 2014 in Münsterlingen, Switzerland from acute heart failure at the age of 80.Udo Jürgens an Herzversagen verstorben ==References== ==Other websites== *Excerpts from a thesis on Jürgens (2002) by Christian Mädler * * * * Udo Jürgens - Ich war noch niemals in New York Musical Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Austrian composers Category:Austrian singers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Eurovision Song Contest winners Category:People from Klagenfurt Category:Pop singers Category:Swiss composers Category:Swiss singers
title: Udo Jürgens
